QuestData.Title: Ancestral Advice
QuestData.Description:
I have a message for my descendent. It is very important.
I understand you are new to our language. I will try to speak in small, |L303(100)-easy|l words. When you are ready to give your full attention, I will |L303(90)-share|l my message.
QuestData.LogDescription: Listen to the ancestor's message and convey it accurately.

Objectives.Objective: Give the message to Little T'oz
